channel.title: Spotweb update notifications
channel.description: Major changes are described in this newsfeed

item.title: Introduced Spotweb change updates
item.description:
Major changes from now on will be visible from within the Spotweb's administration panel. This allows you to easier decide whether you want to upgrade your Spotweb or why a particular upgrade is taking a long time.

Please note that a lot of minor changes will not be communicated here and we recommend to keep your Spotweb installation always up to date.
item.author: spotweb

item.title: Comment moderation
item.description: Spotweb now also deletes or marks moderated comments in a spot, according to your settings centrally moderated comments will either be marked or just removed. This change requires a change to your database which can take a very long time.
item.author: spotweb
